title: Oops, there's Dad [Thai Movie]
description:
Title: Oops, there?s Dad
AKA: Wai Ollawon 4 (Tum-Oh Return)
Year: 2005
Directed: Rutaiwan Wongsirasawad
Genre: Comedy / Family
Runtime: 94 mins
Country: Thailand
Language: Thai
Subtitles: None
IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0470591/

Cast
Piroj Sangwoributh, Lalana Sulawan, Jirawadee Isarangkul Na Ayutthaya

Synopsis:
A fun story of love in different generations through the family of Tum and Oh (Piroj Sangwoributh and Lalana Sulawan) . It&#039;s been 30 years since Tum and Oh became the sweetest couple and the best father and mother. Both have one lovely teenage daughter and son. Their family life gets into trouble when they secretly plan to visit the daughter Bi-Tong (Ka-neungnij Jakasmithanon) for her birthday party with no doubt that Bi-Tong is hiding her artist boyfriend in the room. Meanwhile, Namtoey (Wasit Phongsopa), their beloved son is trying very hard to reveal the truth about himself to the parent. Now, Tum and Oh have to confront the upside-down in their family.
